style.description: This is a style property string.

fields.label: Rich Text
fields.description: Text based input with options for complex formatting. If no value is input to this field in the editor, it will not be displayed on the front end.
fields.shortDescription: Text based input with options for complex formatting.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text will be displayed in the editor whenever the field is blank.

tagName.description: Rich text fields display as a div tag by default. Any valid HTML tag name can be designated.

fields.label: Link
fields.shortDescription: Inputs for an embedded link accepting a label, href, and target.

fields.label: Image
fields.shortDescription: Upload dialog for all image formats.
